title: Louise Haigh – 2021 Comments on the Prime Minister and the Northern Ireland Protocol
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Louise Haigh, the Shadow Secretary of State for Northern Ireland, on 4 March 2021.
content:
Northern Ireland faces real challenges as a result of the Prime Minister’s deal, but they must be addressed through political leadership.
